sub_title: I love singing baroque music, turning wood, working on the fields and in the woods, hunting with my dogs, knitting, gardening,...and yes, crunching data of course and teaching about it.
summary:
I have always been passionate about analytics, exploring data and craft models in order to help companies and people making better business decisions. But I discovered that I also love to work on the fields and woods, hunting with my dogs, wood crafting, gardening, knitting. Hence, I spend a little less time on data crunching. And of course, I did and do love singing baroque music!  

#Music #Research #MD2C #DataScience #Analytics #R #Models #Data #Maths #Stats #Wood #Wool #Woodturning

profile_positions.description: I like to help you to explore your data and craft models in order to make better business decisions. I also try to make academic life a bit better by creating templates to visualize conditional effects, like moderation, moderated mediation, etc., based on the output of the PROCESS macro for SPSS.
profile_positions.title: Data Scientist

profile_positions.description: I work as a Microsoft Certified Trainer in the field of Data & AI for Microsoft Learning Partners. I don't organize courses myself, but I would be happy to get you in touch with those who do.
profile_positions.title: Microsoft Certified Trainer (Data & AI)

profile_positions.description:
Global School for Entrepreneurship offers entrepreneurial education to entrepreneurial students. Meaning: teaching students to think, decide and act as an expert entrepreneur. What makes our approach to education different is that we at Global School for Entrepreneurship offer programs to small groups of diversified students, with a personal approach in an international setting and connecting students with successful business people and startups. Entrepreneurs and intrapreneurs are welcomed to the in-house incubator from day 1.

Rethinking education; practice supported by content
All content and modules are designed to facilitate the entrepreneurial mindset, to encourage their personal development and to stimulate them to give a contribution to the circular economy. So at the end of the three- or four year journey, students will not only have gained their bachelor degree, they will also have built a venture and become a global citizen. Not all students however chose to create their own venture; they want to build a resume with relevant internships.

Building experiences; traveling, venture development & education
At Global School for Entrepreneurship students are facilitated to combine traveling, studying and working in all of Europe’s hottest cities; Amsterdam, Barcelona, Berlin, Florence, Rome and Paris. In these cities students are connected to students of local Universities, local start-ups and inspirational established organizations.
All to facilitate students to unleash and grow their full entrepreneurial potential in the most inspirational way possible.

My role: teaching the students Data & AI skills with state of the art technology.
profile_positions.title: Clinical Professor in Data & AI

profile_positions.description:
In our world, more and more data are being generated. These huge amounts of data can be used to create insights and to predict, if you know what to do with it. We would like to welcome you to explore the world of Data & AI. You can learn the basics of the required skills at your own pace, where and whenever you want.

Some of our courses prepare you for the Microsoft Certified Professional exams, and for others you can obtain a DataChangers Certificate of Completion, so you'll have proof of your newly acquired skills. 

Change your world with DataChangers! DataChangers is part of MD2C, with customers like Microsoft, Wortell, Timing, LLPA, and many others.
profile_positions.title: Founder & Data Scientist

volunteer_experiences.description:
https://globalai.community/

Our mission is to connect AI communities across the world to share ideas and content with each other. We want to enable AI enthusiasts and professionals to join local user groups, connect with like-minded peers, or start their own user group.
 
The Global AI Community empowers developers who are passionate about AI to share knowledge through events and meetups. We host 3 global AI events across 100 locations that span every corner of the globe. We also provide a variety of resources to members of the community, including a free Meetup Pro account for user groups, event-in-a-box content, Azure passes, and support for booking Microsoft venues. We work closely with product teams at Microsoft to share workshop content about the newest Azure AI products.

Missie en Visie Kring: het versterken van de band tussen business en IT op het gebied van data, door het faciliteren van contactmomenten waarop Nyenrodianen met verschillende professies elkaar kunnen leren kennen, kennis kunnen delen, elkaar kunnen inspireren.

volunteer_experiences.description: GUTS is a creative organization with a focus on services, internet communications and the development and exploitation of media projects.
The Arcade Ensemble is a new ensemble in a new cultural environment with a new economic environment.

Accentrics is the organization within Accenture which organizes events for Young Professionals. Target for Accentrics is meeting colleagues and extending professional networks in an informal environment.

Every fiscal year a new board is responsible for organizing, communicating and financing more than 50 events. Responsibility within Accentrics for FY11: Chairman.
The Wallfisch Band is a professional orchestra with a difference, specializing in historically informed performances of music from the 17th and 18th centuries, on the instruments of the same periods.
